tool_description: Creates and manages Kubernetes namespaces with resource quotas and access policies.

namespace_name.description: Name of the namespace to create

kubeconfig.description: Base64 encoded kubeconfig for cluster access

labels.description: Labels to apply in KEY=VALUE format

error_messages: Invalid namespace name: Must follow Kubernetes naming conventions (lowercase, alphanumeric, hyphens).
Kubeconfig authentication failed: Verify kubeconfig is valid and accessible.
Namespace already exists: Choose a different namespace name.
Invalid labels format: Labels must be in KEY=VALUE format.
Cluster connection failed: Unable to connect to Kubernetes cluster.
usage: Provide namespace_name and kubeconfig. Optionally specify labels. Creates the namespace and returns creation details.
